metadata.description: Additional FAQ data and platform features from the main Constructify site

faqs.advanced_project_features: Advanced project management features including BIM integration, 4D scheduling, and real-time cost tracking with automated variance reporting.
faqs.enterprise_integrations: Enterprise integrations with leading construction software including Procore, Autodesk, PlanGrid, and custom ERP systems.
faqs.advanced_analytics: Advanced analytics and business intelligence with predictive modeling, trend analysis, and custom dashboard creation.
faqs.mobile_offline_capabilities: Full offline mobile capabilities allowing field workers to continue operations without internet connectivity with automatic sync when reconnected.

advancedFeatures.bimIntegration: Building Information Modeling (BIM) integration with 3D model viewing, clash detection, and automated quantity takeoffs.
advancedFeatures.iotDevices: IoT device integration for equipment monitoring, environmental sensors, and automated safety alerts.
advancedFeatures.machineLearning: Machine learning algorithms for predictive maintenance, risk assessment, and resource optimization.
advancedFeatures.blockchainCompliance: Blockchain-based compliance tracking for immutable audit trails and smart contract automation.

additionalVerticals.hvac: Specialized HVAC contractor features including ductwork tracking, system commissioning, and energy efficiency reporting.
additionalVerticals.plumbing: Plumbing-specific tools for pipe tracking, pressure testing, and water quality compliance monitoring.
additionalVerticals.electrical: Electrical contractor features with circuit tracking, load calculations, and electrical safety compliance.
additionalVerticals.roofing: Roofing project management with weather tracking, material optimization, and warranty management.

newIndustries.hospitalityConstruction: Hotels, restaurants, and entertainment venues with specialized permitting and health code compliance.
newIndustries.dataCenter: Data center construction with specialized cooling, power, and security requirements.
newIndustries.cleanEnergy: Solar, wind, and renewable energy project management with environmental impact tracking.

instructions.usage: This file will be populated with additional data from the external Constructify platform when provided by Jeff Rogers.
instructions.integration: Data from this file will be automatically merged into the chatbot's knowledge base using the externalDataFeed.syncExternalData() method.
instructions.format: All new entries should follow the existing JSON structure with descriptive keys and detailed explanations.
